text: "You Never Know" is a 1996 song recorded by Swedish-Norwegian Eurodance group Solid Base. It is one of their most well-known songs, taken from the debut album, Finally. The song is sung by lead vocalist Isabelle Heitman, who also wrote the lyrics. The single was successful especially in Scandinavia where it peaked at number 4 in Norway and at number 12 in Finland. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1996) ! Peak position |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Chart (1997) !
